description: Try our easy to follow Flaky Spinach & Cheese Triangles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Flaky Spinach & Cheese Triangles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cover filo with a damp tea towel to prevent it drying out. Brush 2 filo sheets with some of the butter and layer on top of each other. Cut lengthways into 4 strips. Place 1 tbs filling at the end of each strip. Fold the end of pastry diagonally over filling to form a triangle. Continue folding until you reach the end. Brush triangles with a little butter and place on trays. Repeat with remaining pastry, butter and filling. Bake for 18-20 minutes or until golden. Serve garnished with extra dill.
